title: OLP — Efficient Delivery and Logistics Solutions

promo.description: We will help you organize international transportation regardless of sanctions

benefits.title: Unique service
benefits.description: High-quality service with an individual approach: a personal manager 24/7, a loyal business partner and friend.

benefits.title: Reliability
benefits.description: We guarantee non-disclosure of commercial information and high-quality cargo safety.

benefits.title: History of the company
benefits.description: OLP LLC is a specialized company established in 2015 to provide high-quality services in the field of international cargo transportation, customs clearance and certification. We are proud of our reliable and professional contractors. With their help, we successfully solve and implement many tasks and projects from different countries.

services.title: International cargo transportation
services.description: We provide a service for the delivery of goods by all possible means of transport, from anywhere in the world to Russia. Thanks to the many years of experience of our employees and the presence of international partners, we comply with the terms and prices of commercial proposals.

services.title: Customs clearance
services.description: We are ready to offer our clients optimal solutions to minimize customs duties and taxes, as well as reduce the time required to complete customs procedures.

services.title: Certification services
services.description: To save you from low-quality goods and fines for incorrect execution of certificates, we have specialists in this field who will help you with the certification of your products within the framework of the legislation of the Russian Federation.

services.title: Legal circumvention of sanctions
services.description: We will help organize international cargo transportation regardless of sanctions.

services.title: Financial logistics
services.description: We develop an individual action plan based on the client’s needs and goals to minimize risks and increase financial stability. This set of activities and processes is aimed at the effective management of financial flows and resources in an organization when working with foreign trade activities.

services.title: Import/Export of Personal Items
services.description: Our team deals with all aspects of the process of delivering personal belongings between different countries, including processing the necessary documents, packaging and labeling of cargo, choosing the optimal route and vehicle.

reviews.name: Elena
reviews.text: I am very pleased with the work of the transport company! All my goods are delivered on time, without delays. The company's employees are always polite and ready to help. Great service at a reasonable price!

reviews.name: Maksim
reviews.text: I have never encountered such an efficient and reliable transport company! They are so organized that all my shipments arrive faster than expected. You can always contact drivers and couriers with questions or requests, and they respond promptly!

reviews.name: Mihail
reviews.text: Cooperation with this transport company is one of the best decisions for my business! Cargo always arrives safe and sound, and deliveries occur within strictly specified time frames. Professional and responsible staff!

reviews.name: Andrey
reviews.text: The employees do an excellent job, you can feel the professionalism! Delivery of my goods is always carried out in the shortest possible time. Thanks for the great service! I will contact you again!

flexibleApproach.title: Flexible approach to clients
flexibleApproach.description: We work with participants in foreign economic activity
